title: Crashing on Game Start
body:
Just got back into League, and have wanted to give it another go after my first route with it was unenjoyable. So, low and behold, every time I've tried to get into a game, it's crashed.

Works fine on the champion select screen, but when it goes full screen to take you into the game, BAM, send that error report!

So, hoping there's a fix. On the second game that I've ' Abandoned ' due to this bug, and attempting different ways to fix it. Would rather not go 0/3.

replies.body:
Bugsplats are commonly caused by certain issues with your system drivers or hardware problems. We've consolidated a list of steps that commonly resolve this inside our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I'd recommend giving those steps a try.

Let me know the results.
i am having this as well is your computer totally stuck as wel?

The Adobe Air fix did NOT work. Still crashing to Bugsplat on game join, after Champion Pick. If someone's found a fix, please let me know. Otherwise, I'm probably just going to ditch this game until you guys work the kinks out again.
Another user has found a possible fix by uninstalling LoL, installing ' Adobe Air ', and reinstalling. Attempting now. Will post an update if this is a confirmed work-around.
